mapper.select: /* bot.xml selectBotLimitWordSaveAll */ SELECT RES FROM (SELECT '3' AS ORD ,RES FROM (SELECT LISTAGG(A.REQ, ', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY A.REQ) || ' → ' || A.RES AS RES FROM TBOT_WORD_SAVE A WHERE A.LIMIT_YN = '1' GROUP BY A.RES ORDER BY REQ)) ORDER BY ORD

/* bot.xml selectBotWordSaveAll */ SELECT RES FROM ( SELECT '1' AS ORD ,RES FROM (SELECT A.REQ || ' → ' || LISTAGG(A.RES, ', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY A.RES) AS RES FROM TBOT_WORD_SAVE A WHERE A.ROOM_NAME = #{roomName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.LIMIT_YN = '0' GROUP BY A.REQ ORDER BY REQ) ) ORDER BY ORD

/* bot.xml selectBotImgSaveAll */ SELECT RES FROM (SELECT '2' AS ORD ,LISTAGG(B.IN_PRM, ', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY B.IN_PRM) || ' → ' || B.OUT_PRM AS RES FROM TBOT_IMG_MCH B WHERE (B.ROOM_NAME IS NULL OR B.ROOM_NAME = #{roomName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) GROUP BY B.OUT_PRM) ORDER BY ORD
